settings.title:
A world of imagination, adventure,
& wonder for everyone
The Man with a child-like wonderâ€¦
settings.text:
Frederick August Otto Schwarz dreamt of a marvelous bountiful emporium full of extraordinary, one-of-a-kind toys from all over the world. 

His dream became a reality, and today, as the world's most iconic toy store, it has provided wonder and excitement to families for more than 150 years.

settings.title: More than a toy store
settings.text:
A visit to FAO Schwarz is an experience unlike any other. You are at the center of the story. An adventure larger-than-life that sparks the imagination in all of us awaits every time you step through our doors. 

Over the years, we continue to create new, lasting memories for generations of children and nostalgic moments for adults alike.

settings.title: The world's most iconic toy store
settings.subheading: Discover our flagship store in New York City

Sharper Image Toys & Games deliver a world of high-tech fun and learning. From the latest robots, drones and RC toys to cool and unique games, we have the Toys and Games that bring out the kid in everyone.
FAO Schwarz sparks that childlike wonder in us all. The magical heritage of FAO carries on into the future with new adventures and memories to be made.
At the heart of Discovery™ lies smart fun! Delivering on real world adventure, Discovery™ brings an authentic and innovative way to explore your world.

Established over 30 years ago by world renowned entrepreneur and magician Marvin Berglas, Marvin’s Magic is the recognised brand leader and are number one for magic worldwide. They are passionate and innovative in the field of magic, always striving to encourage and inspire the next generation of magicians with their impressive range of magic. The collection includes magic for all ages including Magic Made Easy, Mind Blowing Magic and the award winning Marvins iMagic.

“Bunnies Are our Best Friends, Indeed!  They Do Delight and Gift Glad Dreams” is the Bunnies By The Bay charm and our mission to all.   Here is how we came to develop the Bunny Charm and create Bunnies By The Bay.

For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for the quality and innovation of our products.  The oldest manufacturer of soft toys in America, GUND was one of the first ever companies to produce a teddy bear in the early 1900s.

For more than 25 years, Papo has been creating, inventing, innovating and is now proposing a wide range of 600 items, animals or characters organized in 12 ranges.

From the original first piece to production, each Papo figurine has been designed in France to be made with high quality expectations. Hand painted, the attention to detail of our figurines is recognized worldwide.

Founded in 1880, Steiff is the world’s premier manufacturer of high-end toys and collectibles. Indeed, Steiff is the only luxury toy brand in the marketplace today. Internationally renowned for its exceptional quality, Steiff still utilizes traditional materials and proven manufacturing techniques to create its unique and highly prized products.

Founded in 1883, Ravensburger is a leading producer of puzzles, award-winning board games, and engaging science, and arts and crafts kits. As a family owned business, Ravensburger has built a reputation as a trusted brand for both parents and children alike. Its products encourage playful development at every stage and every age. Toys for the head, hand and heart.

Led by 10-year-old Ryder, the plucky pups of PAW Patrol are rescue dogs in training. Each pup is inspired by a real-world job like fire fighter, police officer, and construction worker. When trouble strikes Adventure Bay, they're there to save the day! Whether it's a cat in a tree or a train off the tracks, they always find a way to help those in need.For kids, PAW Patrol is a fun way to learn bravery and heroism, with exciting stories that never get too scary. Ryder and the pups also teach lessons about caring for animals, a message that is reinforced through PAW Patrol’s reallife partnership with the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.

"My whole philosophy of Barbie was that, through the doll, the little girl could be anything she wanted to be. Barbie always represented the fact that a woman has choices."

- Ruth Handler (Barbie Creator)

BRIO has been creating quality products and happy childhood memories since the end of the 1800s. With a clean and simple design language, BRIO products encourage and open up a whole universe of fun, where the only limitation is your own imagination. Children will create our future world, but it is up to us to give them a good start. Never stop playing.

From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose.

As the world’s largest producer of wooden toys, Hape is clearly dependent on the use of natural materials. A full line of bamboo toys takes advantage of the special properties of this highly renewable material. Plastic parts are ensured durable enough to last for generations in order to encourage toys to be passed down rather than tossed out.

Invented in England by Frank Hornby in 1898, Erector by Meccano was conceived as a model-construction system, based on the principles of mechanical engineering. Adhering to a “Mechanics Made Easy” ethos, the sets are comprised of re-usable metal strips, plates, wheels, axles and gears, with nuts and bolts to connect the pieces. Acquired by Spin Master Ltd. in 2013, Erector by Meccano continues to infuse innovation into the line by incorporating new materials and advanced technologies into its building sets. For generations, Erector by Meccano has inspired countless engineers, designers, architects, and creative minds of all ages.

The brand continues to work with builders, creators, visionaries, and educators to develop products that inspire the pioneers of the future. Erector by Meccano maker systems are currently sold in more than 50 countries.

There’s a hidden land...

...Filled with wonders that can’t be found anywhere else. A place where brightly speckled eggs live with magical creatures inside.

But, they can’t hatch on their own – they need someone curious and caring to love them to life. You are the key to releasing the magic!

Who will you hatch?
